_header: I wot a bird in a bower as beryl so bright
_description: Annot and Iohon — five 10-line aliterative stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Ichot a burde in a bour ase beryl so bryhtAse saphyr in seluer
                    semly on syht…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…He haueþ me to hede þis hendy anonGentil ase jonas
                    heo joyeþ wiþ Ion
